name: Abracadabrew Demo
description:
Abracadabrew is a 1 to 4 players local couch co-op game where you have to combine memory skills and cooperation to brew as much potions as you can before dawn. Gather ingredients hidden across the place and stay focused and organized to unlock new brain-racking potions combinations!

  • Challenge your memory skills
  • Stay focus and communicate
  • Experience different game sessions
  • Master more and more complex potions
  • Have fun!

Enjoyed the demo? Wishlist the full version on steam!

Created by Miju Games
Feel free to follow us and to join our mailing list to get in touch.
